    • Method Detail

      • print

        public void print​(Order order,
                  Restaurant restaurant)
        This method is used to print a formatted order invoice for a Restaurant Reservation and Point of Sale system.
        Specified by:
        print in interface Print
        Parameters:
        order - is an Order object that specifies the order to be printed.
        restaurant - is a Restaurant object that specifies the Restaurant which the orders are obtained from.

      • print

        public void print​(Date startDate,
                  Date endDate,
                  Restaurant restaurant)
        This method is used to calculate the total revenue and print a formatted Sales Report for a Restaurant during a specified time period.
        Specified by:
        print in interface Print
        Parameters:
        startDate - is a Date object to indicate the date which the Sales report should start from.
        endDate - is a Date object to indicate the date which the Sales report should end.
        restaurant - is a Restaurant object that specifies the Restaurant which the orders are obtained from.
